com.communote.server.core.common.i18n

Class LocalizationManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.common.i18n.LocalizationManagement

  • @Service
 @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRES_NEW)
public class LocalizationManagement
extends Object
    This class is responsible for managing custom messages within the database.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocalizationManagement

        public LocalizationManagement()

    • Method Detail

      • getAvailableLanguages

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public Map<Language,Message> getAvailableLanguages(String messageKey,
                                                                                 boolean resourceBundleFallback)
        Return for a given message key the localized message for each of the currently available languages
        Parameters:
        messageKey - The message key to load.
        resourceBundlefallback - whether to return a fallback with the same key from the resource bundle if there is no message for the given key in the database
        Returns:
        Mapping from language to localized message. If no fallback should be returned or no fallback exists the message will be null.

      • getCustomMessage

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public String getCustomMessage(String messageKey,
                                                             Locale locale)
        Method to get a custom localized message from the database.
        Parameters:
        messageKey - The message key.
        locale - The locale.
        Returns:
        The message from the database or a fallback value which was set via setCustomMessageFallback(String, LocalizedMessage) or from the local resources.

      • getCustomMessageFallback

        @Transactional(propagation=SUPPORTS)
public LocalizedMessage getCustomMessageFallback(String messageKey)
        Get a fallback that was set with setCustomMessageFallback(String, LocalizedMessage)
        Parameters:
        messageKey - the key of the message
        Returns:
        the fallback or null if there is no fallback

      • getMessage

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public Message getMessage(String messageKey,
                                                        Locale locale)
        Method to get a custom localized message from the database.
        Parameters:
        messageKey - The message key.
        locale - The locale.
        Returns:
        The message from the database or null.

      • removeCustomMessageFallback

        @Transactional(propagation=SUPPORTS)
public void removeCustomMessageFallback(String messageKey)
        Remove a fallback which was set with setCustomMessageFallback(String, LocalizedMessage)
        Parameters:
        messageKey - the key of the fallback to remove

      • setCustomMessageFallback

        @Transactional(propagation=SUPPORTS)
public void setCustomMessageFallback(String messageKey,
                                                                          LocalizedMessage fallback)
        Set a falback for a custom message. If there is already a fallback for that key it will be overridden.
        Parameters:
        messageKey - the key of the fallback
        fallback - the fallback

      • setMessage

        public void setMessage(String messageKey,
                       String messageValue,
                       String languageCode,
                       boolean isHtml)
        Method to update or create message.
        Parameters:
        messageKey - Key of the message.
        messageValue - Value of the message.
        languageCode - Language code.
        isHtml - True, if this is html.
